options.name: Eye of the Gorgon
options.description:
The bearer’s unit gains Horror.
When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, nominate one Rank-and-File model part, or a model part on the bearer’s model, in the Front Rank of the bearer’s unit; the nominated model part gains Petrifying Stare.

options.name: Caedhren's Pennon
options.description: While the bearer's unit is part of a Combined Charge, the unit and all other units part of this Combined Charge must reroll failed Charge Range rolls and gain Devastating Charge(Hard Target(1)).

options.name: Banner of Urlain
options.description:
Exclusive(Captain, Silent Assassin). The unit’s maximum size is changed to 15 models for units entirely with Height 1, and to 6 models for units entirely with Height 2.
Rank-and-File model parts with Elf in the bearer’s unit gain Devastating Charge(+1 Att).

options.name: Mastery of Slaughter
options.description:
+1 Str, +1 AP.

If the wielder causes one or more HP loss with this weapon, then all attacks made by Rank-and-File models in its unit gain +1 to hit. Duration: Round of Combat.

options.name: Transcendence
options.description: For each HP loss the wielder inflicts with this weapon on enemy models, it gains +1 Str and +1 AP, up to a maximum of +2 each, with Duration: Permanent.

options.name: Seal of the Republic
options.description: For each HP loss the wearer inflicts with Standard Melee Attacks on enemy models, it gains +1 Armour, with Duration: Permanent.

options.name: Ceinran's Scales
options.description: The bearer can cast Whispers of the Veil (Evocation) as a Bound Spell(3+).

options.name: Ring of the Obsidian Thrones
options.description: Unless the wearer is Shaken, Break Tests and Panic Tests taken by friendly units within 6" of the wearer gain Minimised.

options.name: Moithir's Mirror
options.description:
The bearer gains Aegis(5+, against Melee Attacks). If one or more Melee Attacks are allocated towards the bearer, the bearer gains Grind Attack(3, Str 4, AP 2, Magical Attacks, Unmodifiable) until the end of the Round of Combat. This Grind Attack is resolved with Agi 0.
(Note that Attacks made at Agi step 0 can trigger this effect.)

options.name: Ring of Obsidian Thrones
options.description: Unless the wearer is Shaken, Break Tests and Panic Tests taken by friendly units within 6" of the wearer gain Minimised.

options.name: Beastmaster's Vial
options.description: May be activated at the start of any Round of Combat. A friendly unit with Beast within 12" of the bearer gains Dying Blow until it is no longer Engaged in Combat.
